title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 446.31 - Lease schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 446.31 - Lease schedule

State Regulations
(a) For each
individual lease arrangement, please provide: (1)

Name of the leasing company. (2)

Description of equipment
leased. (3)

Term (from-to) of lease
agreement. (4)

Amount of the
monthly lease payment. (5)

Total
cost recorded on the cost report. (b) The grand total of cost reported on the
cost report should equal the amount reported for account 8825, Leases and

Rentals--Movable Equipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
446.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
